revised_title: Algebraic Techniques and Loci: A Letter on Defects and Solutions
tldr: In this letter, John Collins discusses various algebraic techniques and methods for solving cubic equations, including Cardano's formulas and the use of loci. He also explores the properties of binomials and their potential applications in hyperbolas and logarithms. The letter provides insights into the development of algebraic methods during the 17th century.
